extendedInfo.description: We just released one of the coolest Android camera apps ever created!Create sketchy cartoon like photography with your camera.Like us on Facebook and stay tuned for all new cool releases and updates: http://www.facebook.com/FingersoftThis is the pro version. There is a free version with advertisements also available for you to try.Features:- Real-time cartoon effect- 12 effects: Cartoon, Color Drawing, Sepia, White Strokes, Dark Strokes, Colored Edges, Pencil Sketch and many more.- Adjustable edge strength (slider on the right side of the screen)- Adjustable color sensitivity / saturation (slider on the left side of the screen)- Save images quickly by a single touch of a button- Supports auto focus (tap anywhere on the screen)- Supports camera flash- Supports front camera (requires Android 2.3+)- App can be installed to SD- Saved images are stored to external storage under CartoonCamera folderNice trivia: The app icon and in-app buttons were first drawn with colored pens on paper and then photographed with the Cartoon Camera app itself and then put into the app.

reviews.title: Great for creating one\'s own illustrations!
reviews.comment: Paying an artist to produce something unusual for a book (cover or illustrations) will be fun with this. Create a tableau, snap it and yay pressto!
reviews.author: Lynne M-S

reviews.title: Absolutely astonishing
reviews.comment: This app creates the picture so fast and not only makes it cartoonish. But you can make it different levels of the cartoon. It\'s ability is magnificent.
reviews.author: Dustin Cooper

reviews.title: AWESOME APP
reviews.comment: AWESOME APP.  Could use more features and better configurability, but what\'s there is BBC totally great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great cartoon camera!
reviews.comment: I like it alot. Lots of fun! Just wish you could edit the pics in you\'re gallery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun, but limited
reviews.comment: I think this app is a lot of fun and produces very cool pictures! The only reason I only gave three stars is because you can\'t use pictures already in the gallery within the app. If this is added, I\'ll up my rating for sure!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lack of preview
reviews.comment: Fun to use but doesn\'t allow me to view photos previously taken. The photo viewing button in the app only shows very first photo I took with this app. I have to get out of the app to view any photos taken with this app. Please fix.
reviews.author: Matt Karmazin

reviews.title: Great fun
reviews.comment: Simple to use and fun. Would give 5 stars if it would auto save pics to SD card. As it is, you only have 1 working pic at a time and have to use \"share\" function to save it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: I like this app alot.. creates really neat cartoon and comic book style pics.. easy to use and cheap to upgrade.. great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amusing
reviews.comment: This app works great. The extra features for 99 cents is a nice touch. Cartoon/anime has different styles and looks, but this chose a style that can appreciate realistic detail. It\'s fun and worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cute comics-like pic but...
reviews.comment: this app should allow users to play w/ stored pics in their own gallery in their own phones. I have a lot of old pics I\'d like to use this app on.
reviews.author: Leslie Timuat

reviews.title: Galaxy S4 UI To Big!!!
reviews.comment: I have the same problem Hector FF. I like the app but using it is a pain. The control buttons are half off the screen. Please fix this
reviews.author: Ted Trimble

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: UI doesn\'t fit my HTC DNA screen. My buttons are cut half way off other than that it\'s pretty cool
reviews.author: Timmy Clark

reviews.title: Sgx2
reviews.comment: Great app lots of fun filters, would help to create a setting for friendlier filter selections than cycling through the brush. But it is a nice and easy app to use!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app BUT...
reviews.comment: Great app, really fun to play with but you need to save the pictures in the camera\'s default folder or add a setting so that we can edit the save to folder.
reviews.author: Scott Moore

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Love it! Fun app, takes awesome pics. I was amazed at some of the pics we took. Gives cool art look I havent found w other apps. Plus its not complicated!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great pics
reviews.comment: Please do something about the oversized icons and I will add some stars!
reviews.author: Scott Allen

reviews.title: Wanted to Anime Me
reviews.comment: What I was really looking for was a way to change my face into anime. There are plenty of programs that can change you to pencil drawings with newspaper dot-like effects. Its great for inanimate objects though. Just wouldn\'t recommend it for people cartoons. Like I\'d like to make myself into a wow character or anime with big eyes and boobs and stuff. Lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t import photos?
reviews.comment: For this price, I expect to be able to import my gallery photos and convert them to cartoon pics. This app doesn\'t support that. You must take a picture FROM THE APP in order to use the filters. If I\'d known, I\'d have stayed with the free version.
reviews.author: Derek Wade

reviews.title: B+
reviews.comment: Cool, but needs more effects.  Plz include more for this PAID version! B-/
reviews.author: Brian Sharp

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: If you want create artistic profile photo so it look nice and no recognized you what you look like actually, this app help you a lot. Definitely for different various types uses. I like it. It
reviews.author: sunil jadhav
